description:
Conscon is the commander of a Principality of Zeon mobile task force, consisting of a Chivvay-class heavy cruiser and some Musai-class light cruisers, under the command of Dozle Zabi. Under Dozle`s orders, he is dispatched to Side 6 to ambush the White Base.
Source: gundam.wikia.com
name: Conscon
